About.paragraph: VisionDrop AI is a QA/QC company, we innovate affordable kits for home testing that deliver lab accurate results. We are dedicated to empowering individuals to take quality control into their own hands. With our core technologies, microfluidics and smartphone apps, a smartphone can become a personal laboratory.

CoreTech.title: Chemistry
CoreTech.text: Color changing reactions indicate presence of pollutants.

CoreTech.title: Microfluidics
CoreTech.text: Miniscule channels and chambers enable multiplexing of tests.

CoreTech.title: Smartphone App
CoreTech.text: AI-powered App turns your smartphone into a personal laboratory.

CoreTech.title: Deep Learning
CoreTech.text: Language model designed for quantitative analysis to condense report data

Products.paragraph: We are developing a drinking water home lab kit.

TeamDescription: Our team of experts in the fields of microfluidics, chemistry, and artificial intelligence is uniquely positioned to deliver the next-generation of QA/QC technologies. We are building a future in which the individual can verify the quality of the products they consume.

Team.name: Steevanson Bayer
Team.description: HKUST PhD candidate in Chemistry, focuses on detection chemistries

Team.name: Wenting Qiu, PhD
Team.description: HKUST PhD in Chemistry, specializes in microfluidics

Team.name: Gianmarco Suarez, PhD
Team.description: HKUST PhD in Chemistry, specializes in assay systems

Team.name: Yuki Tang
Team.description: HKUST BSc in Biotechnology, with sales & marketing experience from AIA and MSD

Team.name: Nithin Kamineni
Team.description: Graduated from University of Florida, specializes in artificial intelligence

InvestorDesription: VisionDrop AI is committed to making a higher quality future for everyone. If you share our passion in leveraging cutting-edge technology for healthier and smarter lifestyles, then we invite you to join our endeavor.

Funding.name2: 香港科技大學創業中心

Contact.address: 7/F, 7161A near Lift 33, EC Building, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Clear Water Bay, Hong Kong
